name: Sorcerer Kingdom
startIntroPart1: Transported into new world again, Momonga sit in his throne and make announcement to all his guardians who gather below him. We will start new civilization here. We will conquer it with culure and science. But anyone who attack us, will disappear in our territory. This world need our guidance. My name now is Ainz Ooal Gown. I will turn it into an eternal legend.
startIntroPart2: Ainz announcing his goals, setting all of Nazarick into motion.
attacked: Dust.. Yes that's what you will become.
defeated: I'm impressed by your victory. Now Great Tomb of Nazarick will not interfere with your world again.
denounced: May the next civilization built upon your ashes learn from your failures.
introduction: You stand in the presence of Ainz Ooal Gown. Sorcerer King. Supreme Overlord of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. Master of Death.
tradeRequest: What if we make a deal, you and me?
uniques: [+2 Faith] <after founding a Pantheon> <before founding a religion>
[+2 Culture, +1 Happiness] [in all cities] <in cities with an enhanced religion>
Comment [+15% [Production] when constructing wonders in cities with a [Holy site]]
